com.iver.utiles.swing.threads
Interface CancellableMonitorable

All Superinterfaces:
Cancellable, Monitorable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMonitorableTask, CancellableProgressTask, DefaultCancellableMonitorable, TopologyBatchCorrectionTask, TopologyValidationTask
public interface CancellableMonitorable
extends Cancellable, Monitorable

Marked interface to model classes that must be Cancellable (cancels processes) and Monitorable (monitor processes)

Author:
azabala
